title: Slave to Love
description: Special Investigations Section Officer Caroline Palmer is not into whips and chains.... That is, not until Homicide Detective Michael 'Mick' McGraw--better known as The Iceman--leads her undercover into a secret world she never dreamed existed. He says they are tracking a sexual predator, a sadistic killer who preys on adventurous suburban couples. But Caroline knows Mick is looking for something else. Something much more dangerous.
author: Nikita Black
